casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Arvin Roscoe HAYES 287P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 31, 2016 Mr. James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hayes, Arvin Roscoe. Mr. Daniel Snipes Johnson, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of August 2016 by Defendant to Modify Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of August 2016."
